entry.title: $2200 // 2 Bedrooms -- CLOSE to M train __ 1st floor apartment -- Large storage
entry.content:
NO FEE Great 2 Bedroom Apartment:
Apartment Features:
- hardwood floors throughout
- queen size bedrooms
- stainless steel appliances
- granite countertop
- fully tiled bathroom
- big windows.
- pets friendly

The building is located on Irving Ave. Only 1 block to M & L trains at Myrtle - Wyckoff Avs. In walking distance to restaurants, bars, stores, and other public transportation

Call or text to schedule an appointment.

entry.title: $2495 // ***HOT DEAL***HUGE APARTMENT***NO FEES***GREAT PRICE***WONT LAST**
entry.content:
Gorgeous huge 2 bedroom 1 bath apartment in the prime Bushwick location. Conveniently located close to the L/M train lines and various bus lines for a fast and easy commute. steps away from many bars restaurants cafes groceries laundromats and shops. The building is well maintained with a great super on premises.

The apartment features newly renovated, huge living room, hardwood floors, high ceiling, large windows with lots of natural light, 2 huge bedrooms with lots of closet space, nice tiled full bath, nice kitchen, pet friendly and much more. A MUST SEE!

For just $2500 a month, with heat and hot water included, no brokers fee,
To schedule a private viewing and for more details contact Isidore show contact info
